p: The median length of stay was 5 days (mean = 8 days) considering all hospitalizations, respectively 15 days (mean = 18.3 days) for hospitalizations with ICU admission and 4 days (mean = 6.9 days) without (Table S1). The median length of stay increased with age‐group from 2 days in the <20 years to 9 days in the ≥80 years and was stable within each age‐group across seasons.
